original_title: All-time record price for Ceciliyan Tea Factory
original_body_lines: Ceciliyan Tea Factory located in Kalawana, Ratnapura, and managed by Ceciliyan Associates Ltd., established an all-time record price of Rs.1,750 per kg on two invoices of BP1, in the Low Grown CTC Category at this week’s tea auction held on 22 March.
These invoices of tea were purchased by Dilmah Ceylon Tea Company PLC, and the sale was conducted by tea broker John Keells PLC.
